name: Piedmont Park
description: Atlanta's most well-known park, Piedmont offers 189 acres of land including a dog park, sports amenities, a lake, pool and plenty of space for a picnic or 2. Due to the large number of visitors Piedmost receives , hammocks are not welcome.
parking: Piedmont has a paid parking deck accessible from Evelyn St off of Monroe Dr. Street parking is available but limited on 10th street.
